an3.155:1.1: “Mendicants, those sentient beings who do good things in the morning by way of body, speech, and mind have a good morning.
an3.155:2.1: Those sentient beings who do good things at midday by way of body, speech, and mind have a good midday.
an3.155:3.1: Those sentient beings who do good things in the evening by way of body, speech, and mind have a good evening.
an3.155:4.1: A good star, a good fortune,
an3.155:4.2: a good dawn, a good rising,
an3.155:4.3: a good moment, a good hour:
an3.155:4.4: these come with good gifts to spiritual practitioners.
an3.155:5.5: when your deeds have been worthy,
an3.155:6.3: May you and all your relatives
